text:
="preserve">Liam Treadwell (3 January 198623 June 2020) was an English National Hunt jockey. He won over 300 races between 2009 and 2019. He won the 2009 Grand National on Mon Mome at odds of 100/1. He also won the United House Gold Cup, Byrne Group Plate, and Grand Sefton Steeplechase races. He was born in Arundel, West Sussex.
Treadwell died on 23 June 2020 in Billingsley, Shropshire at the age of 34.
